backend/main.mo: Primary Motoko actor implementing rooms, games, turns, shot events, ID generation, admin-token validation, and CRUD-style methods for room/game management.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old Room records into new ones by adding an adminToken field and producing a transformed Actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs for admin-token and host/scorer UI changes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file including pages, components, utilities, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global CSS defining OKLCH theme variables for light/dark modes and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point configuring metadata, PWA manifest, icons, and mounting the React root.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest specifying app name, theme, start URL, display mode, and icon assets.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing install, activate, and fetch handlers for offline caching of core assets.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React routing configuration using TanStack Router with routes for start, game, stats, host, and display screens.
frontend/src/components/game/DoubleFinis: Empty placeholder file intended for a double-finish confirmation modal component.
frontend/src/components/game/GameOverScr: UI component showing winner details and offering actions for stats, rematch, or starting a new game.
frontend/src/components/game/Keypad.tsx: Numeric keypad with quick chips, voice input button, and controls for clearing and submitting scores.
Displays a player's name and remaining score with styling for the active player.
frontend/src/components/game/ResumeSaved: Modal prompting users to resume or discard a previously saved game.
frontend/src/components/game/ThreeDartsE: UI for entering up to three darts with multiplier, value, bull options, and submission controls.
frontend/src/components/game/TurnHistory: Renders the last five turns with dart breakdowns, busts, and win indicators in a table.
frontend/src/components/game/VoiceScoreC: Modal to review voice-transcribed score input and either confirm or edit it.
frontend/src/components/rooms/DisplaySco: Shows either a game-over winner card or a live scoreboard highlighting the active player.
frontend/src/components/rooms/GameSettin: Panel for configuring game mode, double-out rule, and player names before creating a game.
frontend/src/components/rooms/HostLiveSc: Interactive host scoring panel allowing score entry, undo actions, and displaying players and recent turns using snapshot state.
frontend/src/components/rooms/RecentTurn: Read‑only component showing the 10 most recent turns in a table with scores, remaining points, and win indicators.
frontend/src/components/rooms/RoomCodeDi: Displays the room code with a copy‑to‑clipboard button and visual confirmation alert.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameRealtime.ts: Hook managing realtime WebSocket connections for game snapshots, exposing connection state and delivering updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provider and hook managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and authentication state via AuthClient.
Custom hook wrapping browser SpeechRecognition to provide transcript, errors, and listen/stop/reset controls.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus CSS variables defining theme colors for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/layouts/AppLayout.tsx: Main app layout registering a service worker and rendering header, routed content, and footer.
frontend/src/lib/adminTokenStorage.ts: Provides localStorage helpers to get, set, and clear per-room admin tokens with error handling.
frontend/src/lib/checkoutSuggestions.ts: Generates up to three curated dart checkout routes for valid scores when Double Out is enabled.
frontend/src/lib/gameCore.ts: Implements core game state, turn application logic, dart scoring, and win/bust rules.
frontend/src/lib/gamePersistence.ts: Handles saving, loading, migrating, and clearing game state in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/gameSettings.ts: Defines game settings and provides localStorage load/save plus validation and player name sanitization.
frontend/src/lib/gameStats.ts: Computes per‑player statistics such as averages, 180s, busts, and checkout percentages from game history.
frontend/src/lib/realtimeEventEnvelope.t: Defines realtime event envelope types and provides parsing and validation utilities.
frontend/src/lib/realtimeTransport.ts: Implements a WebSocket-based realtime transport with fallback, reconnection, and event handling.
frontend/src/lib/roomGameApi.ts: Provides functions to create games and submit scores for rooms, including local snapshot updates and backend error parsing.
frontend/src/lib/roomsApi.ts: Handles room creation with generated codes and admin tokens, plus fetching and validating rooms via backend actor calls.
frontend/src/lib/voiceScoreParser.ts: Parses spoken English phrases into numeric dart scores, supporting direct numbers and common word patterns.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/GamePage.tsx: Main gameplay UI handling input, voice scoring, realtime updates, persistence, and turn management.
frontend/src/pages/RoomDisplayTvPage.tsx: Read‑only TV display showing scoreboard and recent turns with realtime room-based updates.
frontend/src/pages/RoomHostScorerPage.ts: Host/scorer interface for creating games, managing admin tokens, and viewing live game snapshots.
frontend/src/pages/StartGamePage.tsx: UI for configuring a new game or multi‑device room, managing players, settings, and navigation to game or room views.
frontend/src/pages/StatsPage.tsx: Loads saved game data, computes statistics, and displays player stats with navigation back to game or home.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, typography, container settings, and animations.
project_state.json: Project meta‑state describing app requirements, architecture, features, and current versioning information.
